item.description:
Our next meeting will be held at ACTV in Amherst, MA: http://www.actvamhers... on Thursday, June 25 at 6pm

Folks from the Denver Open Media Project will be out to tell us what they are up to. Denver is part of the Drupal Open Media Project (http://groups.drupal....) and they are working finding the ideal Drupal setup for community television stations, like ACTV.

Thanks to Craig Sinclair of ACTV (synchlayer) for organizing this.

This is just a "save the date" for now. More info to follow...

http://groups.drupal....

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western Mass Drupal Meetup
